[February 5th, 2021 8:41 AM] erich404: what I want isn’t really a histogram, it’s the discrete analog of it, i.e. something like
```function countplot!(ax, things_to_count)
	d = StatsBase.countmap(things_to_count)
	xs = collect(keys(d))
	ys = collect(values(d))
	m, M = extrema(xs)
	ax.xticks = (m:M, string.(m:M))
	return barplot!(ax, xs, ys)
end```
